Summary Note:
Valeria Blanca González and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Madrid. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Valeria Blanca González is a seasoned professional with over 42 years of experience.
Julius Baer's commitment to client satisfaction and innovative financial strategies convinced she to join.
Family Background: Valeria Blanca González is currently widowed. Her children are named Alejandra and López.
Education Background:
Valeria finished secondary school at Colegio La Inmaculada Córdoba in 1977.
Valeria completed her university education at Ramón Llull University in 1983.
Occupation History:
Valeria Blanca González is a seasoned professional with over 42 years of experience.
Valeria Blanca González's first role was as a Financial Advisor at Bankia S.A., where she worked diligently from 1983 to 1985 to establish a strong reputation.
She then transitioned to Banco Santander S.A. as a Portfolio Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1985 to 1990.
At Bankia S.A., she worked as a Wealth Manager from 1992 to 1994, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
She worked as a Family Office Executive at Bankia S.A. from 1996 till retirement, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Wealth Summary:
While working, she saved 1240000 EUR, which she used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
She has townhouse located in Valencia, worth 1378000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns condo in Jerez de la Frontera worth 1132000 EUR.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful condo in Teruel, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 920000 EUR.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Valeria as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
